page.title: 02Stanway Area - A Poem
page.content: Welcome to Didbrook,Toddington and Stanway, Welcome to Wood Stanway too. There's Toddington Station and Stanway Grounds, And lots of things to tell you. There's Didbrook Fields and Stanway Tithe Barn, There's Stanway House and Papermill Farm. There's the Quarry and Didbrook Church There's lots for us to search. We'll tell you of the local policeman, We'll tell you of an Estate worker's plan. We'll tell you about the Flower Show And all the things we can find out or know. We will tell you of things about And all of the things you might doubt; We'll tell you of things old and new And everything we say is true.
